name: scam-pipe

schema.title: SCAM Pipe Generator Options Schema

examples.description: Generates a `MyTransformationPipe` in a `my-transformation` folder in the `my-lib` project

schema.description: Creates a new, generic Angular pipe definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The file path to the SCAM pipe without the file extension and suffix (e.g. `my-app/src/app/my-scam/my-scam` generates the file `my-app/src/app/my-scam/my-scam.pipe.ts`). Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the SCAM pipe file path?

name.description: The pipe symbol name. It not provided, it defaults to the last segment of the provided `path`.

skipTests.description: Do not create `spec.ts` test files for the new pipe.

inlineScam.description: Create the NgModule in the same file as the Pipe.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.
flat.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. It will be removed in Nx v20.

export.description: Specifies if the SCAM should be exported from the project's entry point (normally `index.ts`). It only applies to libraries.

description: Generate a pipe with an accompanying Single Component Angular Module (SCAM).
